phrs.translation: 拉德, 快速应用开发(Rapid Application Development), 快速应用程序开发, 弧度
伯乐, 美国伯乐, 软件, 伯乐公司
魔法总动员, 酷毙了
增强抗辐射性, 抗辐射

sentences.sentence: If prompted, allow RAD to move your report to the appropriate folder within your workspace.
sentences.translation: 如果出现提示，则允许 RAD 将您的报告移动到工作区内适当的文件夹中。

sentences.sentence: Model-driven design and development includes all RAD features, along with modeling and architecture tooling.
sentences.translation: 模型驱动的设计与开发包括所有的 RAD 特性，以及建模与架构工具。

sentences.sentence: Although using RAD during the assembly phase is a fairly common practice, many IT businesses are very specialized with only legacy systems.
sentences.translation: 尽管在组装阶段使用 RAD 是一种很常见的做法，但很多 IT 企业仅在使用遗留系统方面非常专业。
